title: Self-diffusion and shear viscosity of pure 1-alkanol unary system: molecular dynamics simulation and review of experimental data
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22947-22961
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03494E, Paper

Adnan Jaradat, Rakan Al-Salman, Abdalla Obeidat
Self-diffusion coefficients and shear viscosity coefficients of pure 1-alkanol liquids from methanol to 1-hexanol were predicted using molecular dynamics (MD) simulations.
